duas.title: Dua for the Beginning of the Day
duas.translation: O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening.

duas.title: Dua for Protection
duas.arabic: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّي أَعـوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَـمِّ وَالْـحَزَنِ
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety and sorrow.
